thread.section_title: eTurboNews (eTN) - Original and unique global international news with a focus on travel and tourism
thread.title: Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge
thread.title_full: Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge
text:
Click here for information and nomination Japan Airlines announces international fare fuel surcharge 
TOKYO, Japan - Japan Airlines (JAL) has requested for approval from the Japanese Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Tourism (MLIT) to revise down the level of fuel surcharge on all international passenger tickets purchased between December 1, 2015 and January 31, 2016. 
JAL sets fuel surcharge levels bimonthly based on the 2-month average price of Singapore kerosene-type jet fuel. The price of Singapore kerosene-type jet fuel during the two month period of August and September 2015 averaged US$57.92 per barrel, which accounted for 7,054 yen in the average exchange rate of 121.80 JPY/USD during the same period. 
As a result, with reference to the fuel surcharge benchmark list for FY2015 in Japanese yen, this corresponds to Zone B of fuel surcharges. From December 2015 to January 2016, it will range from 300 yen on a Japan - Korea ticket to 7,000 yen on a Japan - USA ticket per person per sector flown, on tickets for travel originating in Japan. 
Fuel Surcharge for the period: December 1, 2015 ~ January 31, 2016 
Current Level: Zone C (Applicable till November 30, 2015) New Level: Zone B (Applicable on/after December 1, 2015) Based on average price of fuel: JPY 8,665/barrel JPY 7,054/barrel Route (Per person per sector flown) For sales in Japan For travel originating in Japan Japan - Korea, Far East Russia JPY 500 JPY 300 Japan- China, Hong Kong, Taiwan JPY 2,500 JPY 1,500 Japan- Guam, Palau, Philippines, Vietnam JPY 3,000 JPY 2,000 Japan- Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand JPY 4,500 JPY 3,000 Japan- Hawaii, India, Sri Lanka, Indonesia JPY 6,000 JPY 4,000 Japan- Canada, Europe, Middle East, Oceania, USA (excl. Hawaii) JPY 10,500 JPY 7,000 
Fuel Surcharge Benchmark List for FY 2015 Priced in Japanese Yen and Eligible for travel originating in Japan 
Below 6,000 Yen Zone A Zone B Zone C Zone D 6,000 Yen
